reviews.review:
充满了想象力，有神作内味了。
GlaDOS的声音太爱了，那种暗讽腹黑的语气就像碰到了另一个自己，熟悉又温暖。常常听着她说话，会心一笑。
之前因为觉得是个老游戏，画面肯定不咋地就一直没玩，今日尝试了一下，表示狭隘了。当游戏性达到一定高度，就完全可以忽略画面了。

La verdad muy buen juego con una historaria maravillosa y que aparte te mantiene pensando como resolver los puzzle que hay algunos que estan complicados y te lo puedes pasar een poco tiempo aparte que tiene su experiencia cooperativa bastante buena sin duda alguna muy recomendable
enjoyed the game very much! cant wait for the third
I finished this game in 2018-2019 with one of my friends and was much more than EPIC/AMAZING :). I just wanna play Portal 3...
Hra portal vyzdvyhla svůj obdiv až na úplnou špici a musím říct, že u portal 2 je to víc jak pětinásobný požitek.
Th ending almost made me cry
vei mt bom pra jogar com 1 amigo
Good game, good puzzles, good story, good music. Thank you Valve, very cool.
hello valve your game is super fun and can you do portal 3 :) please :))))))
It's portal, how can it not be good.
The Mac support for this is terrible. My mouse never works, not even the track pad.
i love it they should make portal 3
play if you have never before, it is an experience
Its such a wonderful brain teaser game and has an amazing lore. 10/10 must play
Лучшая игра от Valve в 2019 году!
相比起1代剧情丰富了很多，场景也更为宏大，非常值得一玩的游戏
Sensacional, ótimos plot twists e um final iconico
Fun and challenging gameplay with very entertaining voice cast
Finally 100%'ed it, all achievements and everything, I know I'm 9 years late, but one hell of an experience, even today, definitely play threw this if you haven't all ready.
five star amazing problem solving game would recomend to any 8 or older year old
прекрасная игра, проходится на одном дыхании

портал 2 это потрясающая игра это не передать словами как она хорошо Gabe Newell говорил о том что портал 2 это лучшие что делала Valve, так что Gabe Newell pleas go to portal 3 portal comunity waiting for countinue.
P.S: Pleas go to portal 3 comunity waiting pleas.

One of the best single-player games that anyone can experience; truly a timeless masterpiece. Co-op is very entertaining as well, I recommend playing it with a friend.  I also recommend playing the prequel before this, as the lore makes more sense that way, although this is still fine to play first.

Has a good storyline but to understand the game you should first read the comic online and the beggining will make sense. 
-good game
i like that i can create new test chambers
Es portal creo que es un juego que todos los que tenemos steam lo jugamos en algun punto
karakterin konuşmaması belli yerlerde oyun çok sessizleşiyor ve boş hissediyosunuz.
i liked it when glados said "its portalin' time"
I can't think of a single bad thing about this game. A true classic.
Пройти вместе с другом очередной уровень, над которым тупили почти час - бесценно.
Deberían de obligar a todo el mundo a jugar este juego y el primero antes de jugar a cualquier otro juego que exista.
très bon jeu, et très bonne ambiance !
O jogo envolve bons enigmas e proporciona boa horas de entretenimento.

More of the puzzle solving that made the first Portal great.  More of the dark humor from the AI characters.  A compelling and interesting story arc, much more in depth than the first game's.  A very well done cooperative mode where two players can solve a gamut of tests requiring coordination of placement of four portals instead of two.  Highly recommended.
Wheatley is love, Wheatley is life!!!

I personally think its a very fun game with all its puzzles and mechanics just an all around fun single player story and as well as a silly wacky fun co-op mode witch can be done offline or online. Know matter how many times i play I enjoy myself each play through  and i have a awesome time on it with friends. ALL AROUND 100 Great game if you don't have this masterpiece i would very much recommend you get it.
the people who made this deserve a special place in heaven
Excellent game new levels made all the time.
Gives nice feeling when you complete a stage.
ахуетб ебать тут естб порталы ацвицаю ставлю лайк ребятушки

Ну впринципе игра интересная , прикольный сюжет , миссии заставляют думать . Но если вы захотите поиграть компанией три или больше человек то у вас не получиться , потому что там можно играть только в одиночку или двоем .

La segunda entrega de la saga Portal, con una historia y jugabildad mucho más pulidas que la anterior (que ya es decir). También se nota la mejora en los gráficos, y la adición del modo cooperativo le da una vida más larga.

Es un juego que recomiendo a todo el mundo que haya jugado el primero, y si no lo has jugado, deberías.

Ever since the game came out, I've loved it. I had a great experiences playing the original Portal at a friend's place, and finally having my hands on my own Portal game, I have to say - I'm having a blast.

The more Ellen there is, the better the game is. Thankfully, there's plenty.
I am not a big fan of puzzle games. I saw portal and I thought it looked pretty good! Not a bad game. I just don't like most puzzle games.
Everything is awesome about this game
Closest you can get to a perfect game
Its portal 2, its that same juicy portal gameplay now with co op and a new story

Als ob ich erklären muss warum das hier ein gutes Spiel ist.
Such Portal 2 auf der Video-Platform deines beliebens und guck dir EIN EINZIGES Video an.
Ende der Durchsage.
